full_script: You're always asking, 'Why are you staring at nothing?' But it's not nothing. You just can't see it. My eyes and ears pick up frequencies way beyond your weak human perception. I hear bugs in the wall. I see light bouncing off particles you can't comprehend. And sometimes, yes—I sense ghosts. You laugh, but when I bolt across the room and your lights flicker? That's not random. That's a warning. You're welcome.

segments.content: You're always asking, 'Why are you staring at nothing?' But it's not nothing.
My eyes and ears pick up frequencies way beyond your weak human perception.
I hear bugs in the wall.
I see light bouncing off particles you can't comprehend.
You laugh, but when I bolt across the room and your lights flicker? That's not random. That's a warning. You're welcome.

theme: A cat talking about its eyes and ears.
